resources.string: LET YOUR EMERGENCY CONTACTS KNOW YOU ARE TRAVELLING

"
"
"Civic Aid application is a free application developed as a college project." "Responsibility of the developers.Civic Aid aims to deliver precisely delivered tools to " "enhance safety and security of individuals across all sectors of their life. The app aims " "to empower citizens and bridge the platform between citizens, police administration and " "other government bodies. It is developed with the ambition to safeguard, educate and " "maintain secure social environment.

 " "Civic Aid is a mobile application that

" ">> Provides empowerment, safety and convenience to common man.
 " ">> Encourages public participation in raising voice anytime, anywhere against any unlawful," "illegal act and development area.
" ">> Takes a step forward towards a crime-free city, safe and civilized society.

"

"

" "Civic Aid application is developed by students of Khalsa college of engineering and " "technology as their major project of 7th semester. This app is not designed to serve " "the clients.

" "It is developed by 

" "Jasmine Kaur ( 1414717 )
" "Inderpreet Kaur ( 1414716 )
" "Mansimar Singh Kalra ( 1414726 )

"

"


" " Civic Aid is a mobile application conceptualized, developed and initited by students as" " their college project.
" "This application is only intended towards convenience and" " empowerment to citizens and it does not guarantee resolution of complaints made.
" "All its features are dedicated to develop a safe and secure living environment.
" "This app does not guarantee any action or result in any manner for any reporting done" "through the application.

" " Civic Aid is not liable to any party or person for unattended complaints."
